member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Conversion
member.summary: Provides methods to render PDFs into images.

member.name: M:PDFtoImage.Conversion.SaveJpeg(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders a single page of a given PDF and saves it as a JPEG.
member.param: The output image file path.
The PDF encoded as Base64.
The password for opening the PDF. Use if no password is needed.
The specific page to be converted.
The DPI scaling to use for rasterization of the PDF.
The width of the desired . Use if the original width should be used.
The height of the desired . Use if the original height should be used.
Specifies whether annotations be rendered.
Specifies whether form filling will be rendered.

member.name: M:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.NativeMethods.LoadLibrary(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified module into the address space of the calling process.

param.name: lpLibFileName
param.para: The name of the module. This can be either a library module (a .dll file) or an executable module (an .exe file). The name specified is the file name of the module and is not related to the name stored in the library module itself, as specified by the LIBRARY keyword in the module-definition (.def) file. If the string specifies a full path, the function searches only that path for the module. If the string specifies a relative path or a module name without a path, the function uses a standard search strategy to find the module; for more information, see the Remarks. If the function cannot find the module, the function fails. When specifying a path, be sure to use backslashes (\\), not forward slashes (/). For more information about paths, see Naming a File or Directory. If the string specifies a module name without a path and the file name extension is omitted, the function appends the default library extension .dll to the module name. To prevent the function from appending .dll to the module name, include a trailing point character (.) in the module name string.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to the module. If the function fails, the return value is NULL. To get extended error information, call GetLastError.

para.see: Learn more about this API from docs.microsoft.com.

member.name: M:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.NativeMethods.FPDF_LoadCustomDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Opens a document using a .NET Stream. Allows opening huge PDFs without loading them into memory first.
member.param: The input Stream. Don't dispose prior to closing the pdf.
Password, if the PDF is protected. Can be null.
Retrieves an IntPtr to the COM object for the Stream. The caller must release this with Marshal.Release prior to Disposing the Stream.
member.returns: An IntPtr to the FPDF_DOCUMENT object.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfDocument

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags
member.summary: Flags that influence the page rendering process.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.None
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.ForPrinting
member.summary: Render for printing.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.Annotations
member.summary: Set if annotations are to be rendered.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.LcdText
member.summary: Set if using text rendering optimized for LCD display.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.NoNativeText
member.summary: Don't use the native text output available on some platforms.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.Grayscale
member.summary: Grayscale output.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.LimitImageCacheSize
member.summary: Limit image cache size.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.ForceHalftone
member.summary: Always use halftone for image stretching.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.Transparent
member.summary: Render with a transparent background.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.CorrectFromDpi
